‘joblauncher’ documentation¶

JobLauncher is a web application which have the purpose to build a common interface for job processing for different applications.

Features¶

  • Plugins : It uses Yapsy plugin system to automatically add new Operations on the interface.
  • Forms : Forms build with Toscawidgets are highly configurable.
  • Interface/controllers : Powered by Turbogears.
  • Database backend : Several backend can be configurated to fit your will : see SQLAlchemy.
  • Processing : Use Celery which allow great configuration on how jobs are processed.
  • Messaging : AMQP is used between the interface and the worker(s).

Implementation of this protocol is supplied with RabbitMQ.
